sqlMap.select: select a.FUNC_ID,a.FUNC_NAME,a.FUNC_TYPE,a.MAIN_HANDLER,b.HANLER_CODE,b.HANLER_URL,a.FUNC_PID,a.FUNC_STATE,a.FUNC_SORT,a.FUNC_DESC from sys_function a left join sys_handler b on a.MAIN_HANDLER = b.HANLER_ID order by FUNC_PID,FUNC_SORT

select b.FUNC_ID,b.FUNC_NAME,b.FUNC_TYPE,b.MAIN_HANDLER,b.FUNC_PID,b.FUNC_STATE,b.FUNC_SORT,b.FUNC_DESC from sys_function a left join sys_function b on a.FUNC_PID=b.FUNC_PID where a.FUNC_ID=#value# order by b.FUNC_SORT
select FUNC_ID,FUNC_NAME,FUNC_TYPE,MAIN_HANDLER,FUNC_PID,FUNC_STATE,FUNC_SORT,FUNC_DESC from sys_function where FUNC_PID = #value# order by FUNC_SORT

select a.FUNC_ID,a.FUNC_NAME,a.FUNC_TYPE,b.HANLER_CODE as MAIN_HANDLER,a.FUNC_PID,a.FUNC_STATE,a.FUNC_SORT,a.FUNC_DESC from sys_function a left join sys_handler b on a.MAIN_HANDLER = b.HANLER_ID where 1=1
a.FUNC_ID=#FUNC_ID#
select max(FUNC_SORT) as MAX_FUNC_SORT from sys_function where FUNC_PID = #value#
